title: Invalid blocks
body:
My console is flooded with `INVALID block` messages. Here's a sample:

```
> I0424 20:10:27.170292    7686 chain_manager.go:556] imported 256 block(s) 0 queued in 1.342537086s. #135555 [b63edfec / 832ade0b]
I0424 20:10:27.292946    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #135583 (b6f8c0b8)
I0424 20:10:27.292968    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 7a7087b77933a2b68fcb327468f6bcbe64a83d448bf335be2daba0726a7308ae
I0424 20:10:29.110097    7686 chain_manager.go:556] imported 256 block(s) 0 queued in 1.429236337s. #135837 [7a7087b7 / f2e5555b]
I0424 20:10:29.785126    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #135971 (cf6ebe57)
I0424 20:10:29.785148    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown b37bdb41c20a981b5eaf4da5314b34e8591133560e6a839e300247bfdc056ead
I0424 20:10:30.247182    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #135995 (b602eb72)
I0424 20:10:30.247206    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 20d6e5535ca722be7594f1cc9bc98c2b487f7c39af445a0e54a2a44e8b9ce6f3
I0424 20:10:30.814896    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #136005 (b35d9db3)
I0424 20:10:30.814928    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 287eedb1e27ef090e86c7fab3edfc2ff409153f1451dc22c7e917d98c904b2c9
I0424 20:10:31.869640    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #136111 (cdb02b0b)
I0424 20:10:31.869663    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 17563000814c96c4dd564a90fc521939820dc08bc410ecc7cc4aa1865800479d
I0424 20:10:33.380755    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #136236 (58023f12)
I0424 20:10:33.380786    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 9c2a7b9149d7e5b32ba26270158e171ed6abc55e968f735ac033e9e4664213fe
I0424 20:10:34.929924    7686 chain_manager.go:556] imported 256 block(s) 0 queued in 1.288853908s. #136490 [9c2a7b91 / 75fb766b]
I0424 20:10:36.259898    7686 chain_manager.go:556] imported 256 block(s) 0 queued in 1.329879913s. #136746 [9a6d7cbf / 57876e17]
I0424 20:10:37.847413    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #136897 (5cee2aaa)
I0424 20:10:37.847446    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 993dab3109d80c46876e0b4c636046231ef6ca050d86401e9f26843d21e656b5
I0424 20:10:38.827965    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #136920 (13df1a11)
I0424 20:10:38.827998    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown dcd229d329d224c627e13fe9d34b88100cbeb00458f3158220a3c105dcf473eb
I0424 20:10:40.115329    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #137065 (bb0d19d9)
I0424 20:10:40.115351    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown d5f367a9fbd635e9825aef1dd4dab4ae726e1f39df1581d505bdd9c57f8a9b4a
I0424 20:10:40.874836    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #137120 (1bcecac8)
I0424 20:10:40.874869    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown dd4d6d8f7906580aa5d54f6bb6efc682f286c519a038aa63206c097aaddc0848
> I0424 20:10:41.629857    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #137151 (67630fec)
I0424 20:10:41.629880    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown 233e49cddba42419dbef4f7dfe2c014bbf6b8c27b67a021b5d077b51c4fc7e89
> I0424 20:10:43.534925    7686 chain_manager.go:556] imported 256 block(s) 0 queued in 1.33873263s. #137405 [233e49cd / 9682cb09]
I0424 20:10:48.547539    7686 chain_manager.go:489] INVALID block #137596 (8adf2578)
I0424 20:10:48.547572    7686 chain_manager.go:490] Block's parent unknown d960768d6f658acab24a3d390cd11f7513e0c3b951ddd5b450b795942d0e34fa
```

Which commit is this based on?

and run `geth version`

How can I determine the commit? (I used `brew install ethereum --devel --build-from-source`.)

```
Welcome to the FRONTIER
Geth
Version: 0.9.10
Protocol Version: 60
Network Id: 0
GO: go1.4.2
OS: darwin
GOPATH=/Users/justin/go
GOROOT=/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec
```

Oh, I just realise this is actually fine.

I thought they were **nonce** errors. It's just telling you it's missing blocks. The error messages are now improved in `0.9.11`. Something along the lines of `missing parent. Requires catch up`.
